comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
That's the Archduke Franz Ferdinand, whose assassination at Sarajevo touched off WWI.
Other Bain Agency photos of Franz Ferdinand and family:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3047667049/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4998196349/]
